items.headline: Gold and silver are rallying again ahead of payrolls report
items.summary_en: Gold and silver futures each rallied on Wednesday, with investors assessing the likelihood of Federal Reserve rate cuts as well as geopolitical tensions.

items.headline: Crude moves higher as Netanyahu visits Washington
items.summary_en: Crude oil futures rose on Wednesday, extending a move off lows as traders assess the likelihood the U.S. will attack oil producer Iran as well as the impact of India shying away from Russian oil.

items.headline: Actress Jennifer Esposito on mortgaging her home in her effort to finance her film, ‘Fresh Kills’

items.headline: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang loves this software maker that just issued a crippling profit warning
